articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: UAE halts all Iran flights over coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: Flight ban comes after Kuwait and Bahrain report coronavirus cases in people returning from Iran.
articles.content:
The United Arab Emirates (UAE) has suspended all flights to and from Iran for at least a week over the outbreak of the new coronavirus after its spread was announced across multiple Middle East nations from the Islamic Republic.

articles.title: In Pictures: The coronavirus outbreak around the world
articles.description: Hundreds of new cases confirmed outside China as coronavirus spreads to more than 30 countries.
articles.content:
Countries around the world stepped up efforts to prevent a pandemic of the flu-like virus that has now infected more than 80,000 people.

articles.author: Virginia Pietromarchi
articles.title: Coronavirus in Middle East: What you need to know
articles.description: Coronavirus spreads to nine countries in Middle East, sending governments scrambling to contain outbreak.
articles.content:
The new coronavirus is spreading rapidly in the Middle East, with cases recorded in at least nine countries in the region - six of them reported their first infections in the past week.

articles.title: Coronavirus outbreak: Italian officials confirm seven deaths
articles.description: The World Health Organization expresses concern over coronavirus in Italy and Iran, as infections spread through the Middle East.
articles.content:

Police are manning checkpoints around 11 towns which have been quarantined for 15 days and residents are stockpiling food.

articles.title: 1,000 tourists in Tenerife quarantine after coronavirus diagnosis
articles.description: Hotel guests have been confined to their rooms after an Italian doctor on holiday tested positive for coronavirus.
articles.content:
